short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a WhatsApp web auxiliary plug-in that can quickly switch the scroll bar position of the friend list using shortcut keys.
short.zh_CN: 这是一款WhatsApp网页端辅助插件，使用快捷键可以快速切换好友列表滚动条位置。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Usage scenario: When using WhatsApp web chat, we want to send a message to all customers. After each message is sent, the friend list will scroll to the top, and then slide the scroll bar to find the customers who have not sent messages to continue sending. After installing the plug-in, we can use the shortcut key Ctrl+Z to quickly slide to the bottom of the page, and use the shortcut key Ctrl+Shift+Z to quickly slide to the top of the page, saving the user's time sliding the scroll bar.

Statement:
WhatsApp is a registered trademark of WhatsApp Inc. in the United States and other countries. Scroll Down for WhatsApp is an independent project and has no relationship with WhatsApp official or WhatsApp Inc.
long.zh_CN:
使用场景：在使用WhatsApp网页端聊天时，我们想把某一消息发送给所有客户，每次发完之后，好友列表都会滚动到顶部，然后滑动滚动条到下面找到未发消息的客户继续发送。安装插件之后，我们可以使用快捷键Ctrl+Z快速滑动到页面底部，使用快捷键Ctrl+Shift+Z快速滑动到页面顶部，省去使用者滑动滚动条的时间。

声明：
WhatsApp是WhatsApp Inc.在美国和其他国家注册的商标。Scroll Down for WhatsApp是一个独立项目，与WhatsApp官方或WhatsApp Inc.没有任何关系。
